summary: Defines an encoder‑decoder Recurrent Neural Network Transducer model for automatic speech recognition, managing data preparation, forward computation, loss calculation, decoding, metric evaluation, and model export, with support for dynamic vocabularies and various training/inference configurations.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to build, train, evaluate, and deploy high‑accuracy RNNT‑based speech‑to‑text systems within the NeMo framework.
